title: Video: 1950 British GP in colour for the first time to celebrate birth of F1
summary: Formula 1 has released footage of the first-ever world championship grand prix, in colour as never before, to celebrate 75 years since the Silverstone race in 1950

qa_pairs.question: What year did the first-ever Formula 1 World Championship Grand Prix take place?

What significant milestone is being celebrated in relation to the 1950 British Grand Prix?
